home.label: A growing suite of fast, reliable tools
home.subLabel: Built for simplicity and performance. New tools are added regularly to help users stay productive and get things done‚Äîwithout distractions or clutter
home.title: Free online tools
home.description: Discover fast, free online tools for daily tasks. Rivine Tools offers privacy-focused web utilities‚Äîalways expanding to meet your needs.

valueSection.title: üõ†Ô∏è Powerful Tools for Everyday Tasks
valueSection.description: Our collection of free online tools helps you solve everyday digital challenges without installing additional software. Simple, effective, and ready when you need them.

benefits.title: No Installation Required
benefits.description: All tools run directly in your browser - no downloads, no installations, no complications.

benefits.title: Privacy-Focused
benefits.description: Your data stays on your device. We don't store your files or information on our servers.

benefits.title: Free to Use
benefits.description: All tools are completely free to use with no hidden costs or premium features.

benefits.title: Continuously Improved
benefits.description: We regularly update our tools based on user feedback and technological advancements.

categories.title: Text & Document Tools
categories.description: Compare texts, convert formats, and transform written content with ease.

categories.title: Image Utilities
categories.description: Edit, convert, and combine images without complex software.

categories.title: Data & Conversion Tools
categories.description: Transform data formats, convert units, and simplify technical tasks.

categories.title: Creative Assistants
categories.description: Generate creative content and visualize ideas with intuitive tools.

usageSection.title: How to Get Started
usageSection.steps: Simply browse our collection above, select the tool you need, and follow the easy instructions on each tool's page. No account creation required - just open and use immediately.

empowerSection.title: Empower Your Workflow
empowerSection.steps: Online tools simplify complex tasks, letting you stay productive wherever you are. Whether you're a student, developer, designer, or just need a quick solution, everything you need is just a click away.

qrCodeGenerator.title: QR Code Generator Free
qrCodeGenerator.label: QR Code Generator
qrCodeGenerator.navDescription: Create QR codes for URLs, text, phone numbers, and more.
qrCodeGenerator.subNavDescription: Generate all types of QR codes in one place.
qrCodeGenerator.description: Generate QR codes instantly with our free online QR code generator. Customize with colors, logos, and high-quality downloads.
qrCodeGenerator.autoGenerationMessage: Your QR Code will be generated automatically

url.label: URL
url.title: Free QR Code Generator | Generate Custom QR Codes Online
url.description: Generate and customize QR codes for URLs. Perfect for sharing content, directing traffic, or enhancing print materials. Fast and free.

text.label: Text
text.navDescription: Encode plain text into QR codes.
text.title: Free QR Code Generator for Text | Create Custom Text QR Codes
text.description: Easily generate and customize QR codes for text messages. Perfect for sharing information quickly and efficiently. Fast amd free.

phone.label: Phone
phone.navDescription: Generate QR codes to dial a number.
phone.title: Free QR Code Generator for Phone Numbers | Create Custom Phone QR Codes
phone.description: Easily generate and customize QR codes for phone numbers. Ideal for sharing contact information instantly. Fast, free, and no signup required.

docs.title: üßæ How to Use the Rivine QR Code Generator
docs.intro: Generate a QR code in seconds! Whether you're linking to a website, sharing a quick note, or embedding a phone number ‚Äî it's all just a few clicks away.

whatIs.title: ‚ú® What is a QR Code?
whatIs.description: A QR (Quick Response) code is a type of barcode that holds information like links, text, or contact details. It can be scanned using your phone camera or a QR code scanner to instantly access the content.

url.title: URL:
url.description: Link to websites, portfolios, or apps.

phone.title: Phone:
phone.description: Embed a number so users can tap and call.

steps.title: üöÄ How to Generate a QR Code

step1.title: Step 1: Pick What You Want to Encode
step1.description: Use the menu on the left to select URL, Text, or Phone.

step2.title: Step 2: Type Your Content
step2.description: Enter your content in the input field. The QR code updates instantly!

step3.title: Step 3: Preview Your QR Code
step3.description: You'll see the code appear to the right ‚Äî ready to scan.

step4.title: Step 4: Choose the File Format
step4.description: Pick PNG or SVG depending on how you‚Äôll use it.

step5.title: Step 5: Download
step5.description: Click the button and you're done!

tips.title: üí° Pro Tips
tips.tip1: For printing, use SVG to avoid blurry edges.
tips.tip2: Leave some white space around the QR code for better scanning.
tips.tip3: Make sure your content is accurate before sharing.
tips.tip4: Test with your phone camera before publishing it anywhere.

qrNotShowing.title: QR Code not showing?
qrNotShowing.description: Double-check that you‚Äôve typed something valid and selected the right tab.

downloadNotWorking.title: Download not working?
downloadNotWorking.description: Try another format or refresh the page.

clock.title: Clock
clock.label: Clock
clock.navDescription: Set timers for a variety of tasks and activities.
clock.subNavDescription: Efficiently manage your time with our comprehensive online timer.
clock.description: Utilize our versatile online timer to track time for tasks, workouts, and more. Customize alerts and durations to suit your needs.

timer.title: Online Timer
timer.label: Timer
timer.navDescription: Set timers for various tasks and activities.
timer.subNavDescription: Manage your time effectively with our online timer.
timer.description: Use our free online timer to keep track of time for tasks, workouts, and more. Customize alerts and durations.

docs.title: ‚è±Ô∏è How to Use the Rivine Timer
docs.intro: Stay productive and manage your time effectively with our customizable timer. Perfect for Pomodoro technique, focused work sessions, and scheduled breaks.

whatIs.title: ‚ú® What is the Timer Tool?
whatIs.description: The Timer is a simple yet powerful time management tool that helps you track time for various activities. With customizable durations and presets for popular techniques like Pomodoro, it's designed to boost your productivity and help maintain a healthy work-rest balance.

visualTimer.title: Visual Progress Indicator
visualTimer.description: A circular progress ring shows your time remaining at a glance.

presets.title: Productivity Presets
presets.description: Quick access to common timer durations like Pomodoro (25 min), Short Break (5 min), and Focus (50 min).

custom.title: Custom Duration
custom.description: Set precise hours, minutes, and seconds for your specific timing needs.

controls.title: Intuitive Controls
controls.description: Simple play, pause, reset, and settings options for easy timer management.

pomodoro.title: Pomodoro (25 minutes)
pomodoro.description: Based on the popular Pomodoro Technique, this 25-minute timer is designed for focused work sessions, typically followed by a short break.

shortBreak.title: Short Break (5 minutes)
shortBreak.description: A quick 5-minute break to rest your mind between work sessions. Perfect after a Pomodoro session.

focus.title: Focus (50 minutes)
focus.description: An extended focus period for deeper work that requires more sustained attention.

step1.title: Step 1: Choose a Timer Duration
step1.description: Select from the preset options (Pomodoro, Short Break, Focus) or set a custom duration.

step2.title: Step 2: Start the Timer
step2.description: Press the play button to begin the countdown. The circle will start filling to visually represent elapsed time.

step3.title: Step 3: Monitor Your Progress
step3.description: Watch the timer count down and the visual indicator show your remaining time.

step4.title: Step 4: Manage Your Timer
step4.description: Pause, resume, or reset the timer as needed using the control buttons.

play.title: Play Button
play.description: Starts or resumes the timer countdown.

pause.title: Pause Button
pause.description: Temporarily stops the timer while preserving the remaining time.

reset.title: Reset Button
reset.description: Returns the timer to its initial duration.

settings.title: Settings Button
settings.description: Opens the timer settings panel to select presets or set custom durations.

customTimer.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Setting a Custom Timer
customTimer.description: Need a specific duration not covered by the presets? Follow these steps to create a custom timer:
customTimer.step1: Click the settings (gear) icon to open Timer Settings.
customTimer.step2: Under 'Custom Duration', set your desired hours, minutes, and seconds using the number inputs.
customTimer.step3: Click 'Save' to confirm your custom duration and return to the timer screen.

tips.title: üí° Pro Tips
tips.tip1: For optimal productivity using the Pomodoro Technique, try 25 minutes of focused work followed by a 5-minute break, then repeat.
tips.tip2: After completing four Pomodoro sessions, take a longer break of 15-30 minutes to recharge.
tips.tip3: Minimize distractions during timed work sessions by closing unnecessary apps and putting your devices in 'Do Not Disturb' mode.

timerNotStarting.title: Timer Not Starting?
timerNotStarting.description: Make sure you've set a duration greater than zero and click the play button to begin the countdown.

notification.title: Can't Hear Timer Completion?
notification.description: Turn up the volume to hear when the timer is finished.

passwordGenerator.title: Password Generator Free
passwordGenerator.label: Password Generator
passwordGenerator.navDescription: Create secure and random passwords to protect your accounts.
passwordGenerator.subNavDescription: Instantly generate strong and unique passwords.
passwordGenerator.description: Use our free online password generator to create secure and random passwords. Customize the length and characters to meet your security needs.

moderate.label: Moderate
moderate.message: Not bad, but not Fort Knox either.

passwordGenerator.autoGenerationMessage: Your password will be generated automatically

docs.title: üîê How to Use the Rivine Password Generator
docs.intro: Generate strong and secure passwords in seconds! Customize the length, character types, and regenerate passwords with just a click.

whatIs.title: ‚ú® What is a Password Generator?
whatIs.description: A password generator creates random, strong passwords for securing your accounts. You can choose specific character types, such as uppercase letters, numbers, symbols, and more to meet your security needs.

length.title: Adjustable Length:
length.description: Set the desired password length to match your security preferences.

uppercase.title: Include Uppercase Letters:
uppercase.description: Optionally include uppercase letters in your password.

lowercase.title: Include Lowercase Letters:
lowercase.description: Optionally include lowercase letters in your password.

symbols.title: Include Symbols:
symbols.description: Add special characters like !, @, #, etc., to make your password more secure.

step1.title: Step 1: Set Your Password Length
step1.description: Use the slider to adjust the length of your password. The longer the password, the more secure it will be.

step2.title: Step 2: Choose Your Character Types
step2.description: Toggle on/off to include uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols.

step3.title: Step 3: Generate Your Password
step3.description: Click the 'Generate' button to create a random, secure password based on your chosen settings.

step4.title: Step 4: Copy or Regenerate the Password
step4.description: Once your password is generated, click the 'Copy' button to save it or 'Regenerate' to create a new one.

tips.title: üí° Pro Tips
tips.tip1: For better security, use a password length of at least 12 characters.
tips.tip2: Including a mix of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols increases password strength.
tips.tip3: Avoid reusing passwords across different sites ‚Äî create a unique password for each account.

lengthError.title: Password Length Error?
lengthError.description: Make sure your password length is at least 8 characters to ensure adequate security.

generationError.title: Password Not Generating?
generationError.description: Double-check that all required fields are selected and the length is appropriate.

length.label: Length
length.title: Secure Password Generator | Customize Password Length
length.description: Choose your password length to ensure adequate security. Recommended: at least 12 characters.

characters.label: Characters
characters.navDescription: Select the types of characters to include.
characters.title: Secure Password Generator | Customize Password Characters
characters.description: Select the types of characters you want to include in your password: letters, numbers, symbols.

text.title: Text Suite
text.label: Text
text.navDescription: Access a comprehensive suite of text tools for all your text processing needs.
text.subNavDescription: Explore a variety of tools to manage, compare, and analyze text.
text.description: Our Text Tools Suite offers a wide range of utilities to handle text processing tasks efficiently. From comparison to analysis, customize your experience to meet your specific requirements.

textCompare.title: Text Compare Free
textCompare.label: Text Compare
textCompare.navDescription: Compare two texts to identify differences and similarities.
textCompare.subNavDescription: Effortlessly compare and analyze text differences.
textCompare.description: Use our free online text compare tool to identify differences between two texts. Customize settings to highlight changes and similarities.

docs.title: üîç How to Use the Rivine Text Compare Tool
docs.intro: Compare two texts side by side to easily spot differences, analyze changes, and merge content effortlessly.

whatIs.title: ‚ú® What is the Text Compare Tool?
whatIs.description: The Text Compare tool is a powerful utility that allows you to identify and visualize differences between two text documents. Whether you're comparing versions of code, documents, or any text content, it highlights changes at the character, word, or line level to help you understand exactly what's changed.

dualView.title: Dual Text Editor
dualView.description: Side-by-side text areas for easy comparison of left and right content.

comparisonModes.title: Multiple Comparison Modes
comparisonModes.description: Choose between Character by Character, Word by Word, or Line by Line comparison methods.

realTime.title: Real-time View
realTime.description: Toggle real-time comparison to see differences as you type.

fileUpload.title: File Upload
fileUpload.description: Import text files directly into either the left or right editor.

merging.title: Text Merging
merging.description: Merge changes from one side to the other with dedicated merge buttons.

character.title: Character by Character
character.description: The most detailed comparison method, highlighting differences at the individual character level. Perfect for spotting small typos or minor text changes.

word.title: Word by Word
word.description: Compares text by treating words as units. This mode is ideal for document editing and content revisions where whole words are often added, deleted, or changed.

line.title: Line by Line
line.description: Compares text line by line, similar to how code diffs work. Best for structured content like code, lists, or any text where line breaks are meaningful.

step1.title: Step 1: Add Your Texts
step1.description: Enter or paste your original text in the left editor and the text you want to compare it with in the right editor. Alternatively, use the Upload buttons to import text files.

step2.title: Step 2: Select Comparison Mode
step2.description: Choose whether to compare Character by Character, Word by Word, or Line by Line from the dropdown menu.

step3.title: Step 3: Toggle Real-time View (Optional)
step3.description: Enable real-time view if you want differences to be highlighted automatically as you type.

step4.title: Step 4: Review Differences
step4.description: Differences will be highlighted with red indicating removed content and green indicating added content. The bottom panel shows a line-by-line comparison for closer inspection.

merging.title: üîÄ Merging Changes
merging.description: The Text Compare tool allows you to merge changes between the left and right text editors:

mergeToRight.title: Merge to Right
mergeToRight.description: Copies content from the left editor to the right editor, overwriting the right text with the left text.

mergeToLeft.title: Merge to Left
mergeToLeft.description: Copies content from the right editor to the left editor, overwriting the left text with the right text.

docs.exampleNote: In this example, 'old' has been replaced with 'updated', shown with red highlighting for removed content and green for added content.

tips.title: üí° Pro Tips
tips.tip1: For code comparison, Line by Line mode typically works best to match how version control systems show differences.
tips.tip2: When comparing long documents, try Word by Word mode first for a clearer overview of substantial changes.
tips.tip3: Use the 'Upload' button to quickly compare files from your local system without copy-pasting.
tips.tip4: For the most accurate comparison when working with formatted text, first strip any formatting by pasting as plain text.

largeFiles.title: Performance with Large Files
largeFiles.description: If comparing very large texts causes slowness, try disabling real-time comparison and use manual comparison instead.

formatting.title: Formatting Issues
formatting.description: The tool compares plain text only. If formatting appears different, ensure you're pasting as plain text without hidden formatting characters.

encoding.title: Character Encoding Problems
encoding.description: If special characters appear differently in the two texts despite being identical, check that both texts use the same character encoding.

json.title: JSON
json.label: JSON Tools
json.navDescription: Comprehensive suite for all your JSON needs.
json.subNavDescription: Effortlessly handle, edit, and format JSON data.
json.description: Explore our comprehensive suite of free online JSON tools to edit, format, validate, and analyze JSON data. Customize settings to enhance your JSON handling experience.

jsonEditor.title: JSON Editor Free
jsonEditor.label: JSON Editor
jsonEditor.navDescription: Edit and format JSON data with ease.
jsonEditor.subNavDescription: Effortlessly edit and format JSON data.
jsonEditor.description: Use our free online JSON editor tool to edit and format JSON data. Customize settings to enhance your JSON editing experience.

docs.title: üß© How to Use the Rivine JSON Editor
docs.intro: Edit, format, and transform JSON data with ease. The dual-editor interface allows you to work with multiple JSON documents simultaneously with powerful visualization and editing features.

whatIs.title: ‚ú® What is a JSON Editor?
whatIs.description: A JSON Editor is a tool that helps you create, edit, and validate JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) data. Our editor provides multiple views and powerful features to make working with JSON easy and efficient.

dualEditor.title: Dual Editor Interface
dualEditor.description: Work with two JSON documents side by side, making it easy to compare, copy, or merge content between them.

viewModes.title: Multiple View Modes
viewModes.description: Switch between Code, Tree, Table, and Preview modes to visualize your JSON data in the most helpful format.

formatting.title: Format & Beautify
formatting.description: Automatically format and indent your JSON for better readability with a single click.

search.title: Search & Replace
search.description: Quickly find and replace values within your JSON documents, with support for regular expressions.

transform.title: Transform & Manipulate
transform.description: Sort, filter, and transform your JSON data using built-in transformation tools.

code.title: Code Mode
code.description: Edit raw JSON text with syntax highlighting, autocompletion, and error detection.

tree.title: Tree Mode
tree.description: Navigate and edit JSON as a collapsible tree structure, perfect for nested data.

table.title: Table Mode
table.description: View and edit JSON arrays as tables with sortable columns.

preview.title: Preview Mode
preview.description: See a formatted, read-only view of your JSON data, ideal for reviewing content.

steps.title: üöÄ How to Use the JSON Editor

step1.title: Step 1: Enter or Import JSON
step1.description: Type directly into the editor, paste from clipboard, or import a JSON file from your device.

step2.title: Step 2: Choose Your View Mode
step2.description: Select between Code, Tree, Table, or Preview modes based on your editing needs.

step3.title: Step 3: Edit and Transform
step3.description: Modify your JSON data using the editor's features, including adding, editing, or deleting properties.

step4.title: Step 4: Export or Copy
step4.description: Copy your JSON to clipboard or export it as a file once you've completed your edits.

filter.title: Query-based Filtering
filter.description: Filter large JSON documents using query expressions to focus on specific data.

sort.title: Sort Keys and Values
sort.description: Organize your JSON by sorting keys alphabetically or values numerically.

transform.title: JSON Transformation
transform.description: Apply transformations like flattening nested structures, converting types, or restructuring data.

repair.title: Fix Malformed JSON
repair.description: Automatically repair common syntax errors in malformed JSON documents.

navigation.title: Path Navigation
navigation.description: Navigate complex JSON structures using path expressions to quickly locate specific nodes.

tips.title: üí° Pro Tips
tips.tip1: Use keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+F for search, Ctrl+I for formatting) to speed up your workflow.
tips.tip2: For large JSON files, Tree view can help you navigate and understand the structure better than Code view.
tips.tip3: When comparing two JSON documents, use the dual editor layout and sync scrolling feature.
tips.tip4: Use the 'Copy Path' feature to get the exact JSON path to a specific value, useful for APIs and documentation.

invalidJson.title: Invalid JSON Error?
invalidJson.description: Check for missing commas, extra commas, or unclosed brackets. The editor will highlight syntax errors to help you identify issues.

performance.title: Editor Running Slowly?
performance.description: For very large JSON files (over 1MB), consider using Code mode instead of Tree mode for better performance.

dataLoss.title: Concerned About Data Loss?
dataLoss.description: Use the 'Save to Local Storage' feature to automatically back up your work as you edit.

image.title: Image Suite
image.label: Image
image.navDescription: Access a comprehensive suite of image tools for all your image processing needs.
image.subNavDescription: Explore a variety of tools to manage, edit, and analyze images.
image.description: Our Image Tools Suite offers a wide range of utilities to handle image processing tasks efficiently. From editing to analysis, customize your experience to meet your specific requirements.

imageMerge.title: Image Merge Tool
imageMerge.label: Image Merge
imageMerge.navDescription: Combine multiple images into a single image effortlessly.
imageMerge.subNavDescription: Easily merge multiple images into one.
imageMerge.description: Use our Image Merge Tool to seamlessly combine multiple images into a single image. Customize settings to enhance your image merging experience.

page.title: Image Merger
page.description: Easily merge multiple images into one
page.error: Upload at least one image to see the merged result
page.tune: Adjust the merger settings to achieve the desired output

docs.title: üñºÔ∏è How to Use the Image Merger Tool
docs.intro: Easily combine multiple images into a single composite image with customizable layouts and settings.

whatIs.title: ‚ú® What is the Image Merger Tool?
whatIs.description: The Image Merger tool is a powerful utility that allows you to combine multiple images into a single composite image. Whether you need to create collages, comparison images, or multi-panel displays, this tool helps you arrange and merge images with customizable positioning and formatting options.

multipleImages.title: Multiple Image Support
multipleImages.description: Combine between 2 and 10 images in a single merged output.

positionOptions.title: Flexible Positioning
positionOptions.description: Arrange images horizontally side by side, vertically stacked, or in a grid layout.

sizeControl.title: Size Normalization
sizeControl.description: Choose how images are sized relative to each other when merging.

borderOptions.title: Border Customization
borderOptions.description: Add and customize borders between images for clear separation.

imageSettings.title: Individual Image Settings
imageSettings.description: Control the size and appearance of each image independently.

step1.title: Step 1: Upload Your Images
step1.description: Click the 'Upload image' button in each image panel to add your source images. You need at least 2 images to perform a merge.

step2.title: Step 2: Set Number of Images
step2.description: Use the '+' and '-' buttons to adjust the number of images you want to merge (minimum 2, maximum 10).

step3.title: Step 3: Choose Image Position
step3.description: Select the arrangement style from the 'Image Position' dropdown: Horizontal (side by side), Vertical (stacked), or Grid layout.

step4.title: Step 4: Adjust Size Normalization
step4.description: Select how images should be sized relative to each other. Options include 'Fit to Smallest Image', 'Match Largest Image', or 'Keep Original Sizes'.

step5.title: Step 5: Configure Border Settings (Optional)
step5.description: Click the 'Border' tab to add and customize borders between images, including border width, color, and style.

step6.title: Step 6: Preview and Download
step6.description: The merged result will be displayed automatically. When satisfied with the result, download your merged image.

horizontal.title: Horizontal (Side by Side)
horizontal.description: Places images next to each other in a row. Best for comparing images side by side or creating panoramic compositions.

vertical.title: Vertical (Stacked)
vertical.description: Stacks images on top of each other. Ideal for before-and-after comparisons or sequential displays.

grid.title: Grid Layout
grid.description: Arranges images in a grid pattern. Perfect for creating collages or when working with several images of similar importance.

fitToSmallest.title: Fit to Smallest Image
fitToSmallest.description: Scales all images to match the dimensions of the smallest image. Ensures consistency but may reduce larger images.

matchLargest.title: Match Largest Image
matchLargest.description: Scales all images to match the dimensions of the largest image. Preserves detail in large images but increases output file size.

originalSize.title: Keep Original Sizes
originalSize.description: Maintains each image's original dimensions. Results in an asymmetrical composition but preserves all original details.

width.title: Border Width
width.description: Set the thickness of borders between images from 0 (no border) up to 20 pixels.

color.title: Border Color
color.description: Choose any color for the borders to complement your images or create visual separation.

style.title: Border Style
style.description: Select border styles including solid, dashed, or dotted lines.

imageLimit.title: üì± Image Limits
imageLimit.description: The Image Merger tool requires a minimum of 2 images and allows a maximum of 10 images to be combined at once.

tips.title: üí° Pro Tips
tips.tip1: For best results when using 'Side by Side' mode, choose images with similar heights.
tips.tip2: When creating a vertical stack, images with similar widths work best together.
tips.tip3: The grid layout automatically arranges images in the most balanced formation based on the number of images.
tips.tip4: Adding a border can help distinguish between images with similar colors or content.
tips.tip5: Consider using 'Fit to Smallest Image' for faster processing and smaller file sizes.

notMerging.title: Images Not Merging
notMerging.description: Make sure you've uploaded at least two valid image files. The merge preview displays automatically once sufficient images are loaded.

qualityIssues.title: Quality Loss
qualityIssues.description: If merged images appear lower quality than originals, try 'Keep Original Sizes' or 'Match Largest Image' settings to preserve details.

layoutProblems.title: Layout Problems
layoutProblems.description: If the merged layout doesn't look right, try a different position setting or normalize the image sizes for a more balanced composition.

textToHandwriting.title: Text to Handwriting Tool
textToHandwriting.label: Text to Handwriting
textToHandwriting.navDescription: Convert typed text into realistic handwriting effortlessly.
textToHandwriting.subNavDescription: Easily transform text into handwritten notes.
textToHandwriting.description: Use our Text to Handwriting Tool to convert your typed text into realistic handwriting. Customize settings to enhance your handwriting experience.

page.title: Text to Handwriting
page.description: Easily convert typed text into realistic handwriting
page.empBookDes: Add pages from the editor or upload images to create your book
page.note: If lines or text overlap, adjust the settings. To download multiple pages, use "Add to Book" and scroll down to download.

docs.title: üñãÔ∏è How to Use the Text to Handwriting Tool
docs.intro: Convert typed text into realistic handwriting with customizable styles and formatting options.

whatIs.title: ‚ú® What is the Text to Handwriting Tool?
whatIs.description: The Text to Handwriting tool is a versatile utility that transforms digital text into authentic-looking handwritten content. Whether you're creating notes, letters, study materials, or creative projects, this tool gives your digital text a personal handwritten touch with various customization options.

fonts.title: Realistic Handwriting Fonts
fonts.description: Choose from multiple handwriting styles to find the perfect match for your needs.

customization.title: Customizable Appearance
customization.description: Adjust font size, spacing, margins, and positioning to create the ideal handwritten look.

colorOptions.title: Color Options
colorOptions.description: Personalize ink color, page background, and line colors to suit your preferences.

pageFormat.title: Page Format Control
pageFormat.description: Select paper sizes and toggle page elements like margins and lines.

multiPage.title: Multi-page Support
multiPage.description: Create and manage multiple pages of handwritten content in a single document.

exportOptions.title: Export Options
exportOptions.description: Download individual pages as images or compile multiple pages into a single PDF book.

step1.title: Step 1: Enter Your Text
step1.description: Type or paste your text in the editor area on the left side of the screen. The text will be rendered as handwriting in the preview panel on the right.

step2.title: Step 2: Select Handwriting Style
step2.description: Choose your preferred handwriting style from the 'Handwriting Font' dropdown menu. Each font provides a unique handwritten appearance.

step3.title: Step 3: Customize the Formatting
step3.description: Adjust font size, line spacing, word spacing, letter spacing, margins, and page size to perfect your handwritten document.

step4.title: Step 4: Customize Colors
step4.description: Choose colors for the ink, page background, lines, and margin to create your desired aesthetic.

step5.title: Step 5: Toggle Visual Elements
step5.description: Use the toggles to show or hide page margins and ruled lines according to your preference.

multiPage.title: üîÄ Creating Multi-Page Documents
multiPage.description: The Text to Handwriting tool allows you to build multi-page documents:

addPages.title: Adding Pages to Your Book
addPages.description: Format your text, click 'Add to Book', then create new pages by modifying text and repeating the process.

managingBook.title: Managing Your Book
managingBook.description: All pages added to your book will appear in the book area at the bottom of the screen.

singlePage.title: Individual Page Download
singlePage.description: Use the 'Download as Image' button to save the current page as an image file.

multiPage.title: Multi-Page Download Options
multiPage.description: After adding pages to your book, use 'Download as PDF' to compile all pages into a single document or 'Download All Images' for individual files.

tips.title: üí° Pro Tips
tips.tip1: If lines or text overlap, adjust the spacing settings for better readability.
tips.tip2: For consistent formatting across multiple pages, make note of your settings before adding each new page.
tips.tip3: The 'Add to Book' feature is essential for creating multi-page documents that you can download together as a PDF.
tips.tip4: Experiment with different handwriting fonts to find the style that best matches your needs.
tips.tip5: Use the preview panel to see how your settings affect the final appearance before downloading.

layout.title: Page Layout Issues
layout.description: If text appears cut off or overlapping, try reducing font size, increasing line spacing, or adjusting margin settings.

download.title: Download Problems
download.description: Make sure to click 'Add to Book' for each page you want included in your PDF and verify all pages are added before downloading.

rendering.title: Text Rendering
rendering.description: If handwriting appears inconsistent, try adjusting letter and word spacing, and ensure your text doesn't contain unsupported special characters.

characterCounter.title: Character Counter Tool
characterCounter.label: Character Counter
characterCounter.navDescription: Count characters and words in your text effortlessly.
characterCounter.subNavDescription: Easily count characters and words in your text.
characterCounter.description: Use our Character Counter Tool to quickly count the number of characters and words in your text.

page.title: Character Counter
page.description: Count characters and words in your text effortlessly.

input.label: Enter your text
input.placeholder: Type or paste your text here...

stopAt.label: Stop counting at
stopAt.help: Count only up to this letter or word

docs.title: üî¢ How to Use the Character Counter Tool
docs.intro: Easily count and analyze text with customizable filters and options.

whatIs.title: ‚ú® What is the Character Counter Tool?
whatIs.description: The Character Counter tool is a powerful utility that allows you to count characters in your text with precision. Whether you need to count for social media posts, SEO content, or programming tasks, this tool helps you analyze text with customizable filters and formatting options.

realTimeCount.title: Real-time Character Counting
realTimeCount.description: See your character count update instantly as you type or edit your text.

filterOptions.title: Customizable Filters
filterOptions.description: Filter out specific characters, numbers, symbols, or whitespace from your count.

stopAt.title: Partial Text Analysis
stopAt.description: Count characters up to a specific character or word in your text.

caseOptions.title: Case Sensitivity Options
caseOptions.description: Include or exclude uppercase or lowercase letters from your count.

trimWhitespace.title: Whitespace Management
trimWhitespace.description: Optionally trim leading and trailing whitespace before counting.

steps.title: üöÄ How to Use the Character Counter

step1.title: Step 1: Enter Your Text
step1.description: Type or paste your text into the input field. The character count will update automatically as you make changes.

step2.title: Step 2: View Your Character Count
step2.description: The number of characters in your text is displayed prominently in the counter. The count updates in real-time as you edit your text.

step3.title: Step 3: Apply Filters (Optional)
step3.description: Use the filter options to customize what gets counted. You can exclude specific characters, numbers, symbols, or whitespace.

step4.title: Step 4: Set Count Limits (Optional)
step4.description: If you only want to count up to a certain point in your text, enter a character or word in the 'Stop counting at' field.

step5.title: Step 5: Preview and Copy Results
step5.description: View your processed text and final character count. You can copy the count to your clipboard if needed.

stopAt.title: Stop Counting At
stopAt.description: Limits the count to only include characters up to a specific character or word. Useful for checking if text fits within specific limits.

ignoreChars.title: Ignore Specific Characters
ignoreChars.description: Exclude specific characters from the count. Enter the characters you want to ignore without separators.

trimText.title: Trim Whitespace
trimText.description: Removes leading and trailing whitespace before counting. Useful for more accurate counts when whitespace shouldn't be included.

numbers.title: Ignore Numbers
numbers.description: Excludes all numeric digits (0-9) from the character count.

symbols.title: Ignore Symbols
symbols.description: Excludes all special characters and symbols from the count, focusing only on alphanumeric characters.

uppercase.title: Ignore Uppercase Letters
uppercase.description: Excludes all capital letters from the count. Useful when you only want to count lowercase content.

lowercase.title: Ignore Lowercase Letters
lowercase.description: Excludes all lowercase letters from the count. Useful when you only want to count uppercase content.

whitespace.title: Ignore Whitespace
whitespace.description: Excludes all spaces, tabs, and line breaks from the count. Provides a count of only visible characters.

preview.title: üëÅÔ∏è Processed Text Preview
preview.description: Shows your text after all filters have been applied. This is the exact text being used for the character count.

tips.title: üí° Pro Tips
tips.tip1: Use 'Ignore Whitespace' when counting characters for coding or when spaces shouldn't count toward your total.
tips.tip2: The 'Stop counting at' feature is perfect for checking if your text will fit within character limits for social media platforms.
tips.tip3: For SEO title tag optimization, use the counter without any filters to stay within recommended character limits.
tips.tip4: When counting words that contain special formatting, use the ignore options to count only the characters that matter to you.
tips.tip5: The processed text preview helps you understand exactly what's being counted after all your filters are applied.

unexpectedCount.title: Unexpected Character Count
unexpectedCount.description: If your count seems off, check if any filters are enabled. The processed text preview shows exactly what's being counted.

filterInteraction.title: Filter Conflicts
filterInteraction.description: Enabling too many filters might result in very little text to count. Use the processed text preview to see what remains after filtering.

performanceIssues.title: Performance with Large Text
performanceIssues.description: For very large text, the counter may take a moment to update. Be patient or try breaking your text into smaller sections.

wordCounter.title: Word Counter Tool
wordCounter.label: Word Counter
wordCounter.navDescription: Count words in your text effortlessly.
wordCounter.subNavDescription: Easily count words in your text with custom filters.
wordCounter.description: Use our Word Counter Tool to quickly count the number of words in your text.

page.title: Word Counter
page.description: Count words in your text with customizable filters and options.

input.label: Enter your text
input.placeholder: Type or paste your text here...

dialog.title: Edit Common Words
dialog.description: Enter common words separated by commas that you want to exclude from your word count.

stopAtWord.label: Stop counting at
stopAtWord.help: Count only up to this word

minWordLength.label: Minimum word length
minWordLength.help: Only count words with this many characters or more

maxWordLength.label: Maximum word length
maxWordLength.help: Only count words with this many characters or fewer

wordTypes.title: Word Types
wordTypes.ignoreCommonWords: Ignore common words (a, the, and, etc.)
wordTypes.countHyphenatedAsOne: Count hyphenated words as one word

docs.title: üìù How to Use the Word Counter Tool
docs.intro: Easily count and analyze words with customizable filters and options.

whatIs.title: ‚ú® What is the Word Counter Tool?
whatIs.description: The Word Counter tool is a powerful utility that allows you to count words in your text with precision. Whether you need to check word counts for essays, articles, social media posts, or SEO content, this tool helps you analyze text with customizable filters and word-specific options.

realTimeCount.title: Real-time Word Counting
realTimeCount.description: See your word count update instantly as you type or edit your text.

filterOptions.title: Customizable Filters
filterOptions.description: Filter your count based on word types, common words, and other criteria.

wordLength.title: Word Length Control
wordLength.description: Count only words that meet specific length requirements.

wordTypes.title: Word Type Filtering
wordTypes.description: Choose which types of words to include in your count, such as numbers, abbreviations, and hyphenated words.

trimWhitespace.title: Whitespace Management
trimWhitespace.description: Optionally trim leading and trailing whitespace before counting.

steps.title: üöÄ How to Use the Word Counter

step1.title: Step 1: Enter Your Text
step1.description: Type or paste your text into the input field. The word count will update automatically as you make changes.

step2.title: Step 2: View Your Word Count
step2.description: The number of words in your text is displayed prominently in the counter. The count updates in real-time as you edit your text.

step3.title: Step 3: Apply Filters (Optional)
step3.description: Use the filter options to customize what gets counted. You can exclude common words, set word length requirements, and filter by word types.

step4.title: Step 4: Set Count Limits (Optional)
step4.description: If you only want to count up to a certain point in your text, enter a word in the 'Stop counting at' field.

step5.title: Step 5: Preview and Copy Results
step5.description: View your processed text and final word count. You can copy the count to your clipboard if needed.

stopAtWord.title: Stop Counting At
stopAtWord.description: Limits the count to only include words up to a specific word. Useful for checking if text fits within specific word limits or analyzing sections of longer texts.

minWordLength.title: Minimum Word Length
minWordLength.description: Only counts words that have at least this many characters. Useful for excluding very short words like 'a', 'an', 'the', etc.

maxWordLength.title: Maximum Word Length
maxWordLength.description: Only counts words that have at most this many characters. Useful for excluding very long words or potential errors in your text.

trimText.title: Trim Whitespace
trimText.description: Removes leading and trailing whitespace before counting. Useful for more accurate counts when whitespace shouldn't affect your word count.

ignoreCommonWords.title: Ignore Common Words
ignoreCommonWords.description: Excludes common words like 'the', 'a', 'an', 'and', etc. from the count. Useful for focusing on the more meaningful content words.

countNumbers.title: Count Numbers
countNumbers.description: When enabled, treats numeric strings (like '42' or '2025') as words. When disabled, numbers won't be included in the word count.

countHyphenatedAsOne.title: Count Hyphenated Words as One
countHyphenatedAsOne.description: When enabled, treats hyphenated terms (like 'state-of-the-art') as a single word. When disabled, each part is counted separately.

countAbbreviations.title: Count Abbreviations
countAbbreviations.description: When enabled, includes abbreviations and acronyms (like 'USA' or 'NASA') in the word count. When disabled, they are excluded.

preview.title: üëÅÔ∏è Processed Text Preview
preview.description: Shows your text after all filters have been applied. This is the exact text being used for the word count.

tips.title: üí° Pro Tips
tips.tip1: Use 'Minimum Word Length' to focus on more meaningful content words and filter out short articles and prepositions.
tips.tip2: The 'Stop counting at' feature is perfect for checking if your introduction stays within a specific word limit.
tips.tip3: For academic writing, enable 'Count Hyphenated Words as One' to match most style guide word count rules.
tips.tip4: Use 'Ignore Common Words' when you want to analyze the density of key terms in your content.
tips.tip5: The processed text preview helps you understand exactly what's being counted after all your filters are applied.

unexpectedCount.title: Unexpected Word Count
unexpectedCount.description: If your count seems off, check if any filters are enabled. The processed text preview shows exactly what's being counted.

filterInteraction.title: Filter Conflicts
filterInteraction.description: Using multiple filters together might significantly reduce your word count. For example, setting a high minimum word length while ignoring common words might filter out a large portion of your text.

performanceIssues.title: Performance with Large Text
performanceIssues.description: For very large documents, the counter may take a moment to update. Be patient or try breaking your text into smaller sections.
